modal.spc_desc: The amount of Shards you get per click. Boosted by upgrades, the Prestige Tree, and a small bonus for clicking the main Shard directly.
modal.crit_desc: Your chance to land a critical hit for bonus shards. Current Damage: x{{damage}}.
modal.sps_desc: Shards earned automatically from Generators and Shardlings. Boosted by upgrades and the Prestige Tree.
modal.relics_desc: A special currency earned from Prestiging. Spend Relics in the Prestige tab on powerful, permanent upgrades that persist through resets.
modal.dust_desc: A special resource earned from defeating bosses and finding Golden Shards. Used to craft powerful Talismans.
modal.essence_desc: An extremely powerful currency earned from Ascending. Spend it on game-altering upgrades in the Ascension tab.
modal.prestige_desc: Reset your Shards, Upgrades, and Generators to gain powerful Relics.
modal.ascension_desc: Perform a deeper reset, resetting all Shards, Upgrades, Generators, and Relics. In return, you will gain Singularity Essence.
modal.challenge_confirm_desc: This will start a parallel playthrough. Your main game progress will be saved and restored after the challenge.
modal.challenge_confirm_reward: If you complete the challenge, you'll earn the reward for your main game.
modal.challenge_confirm_exit: If you exit before completing it, you will lose all challenge progress and return to your main game.
modal.evolve_desc: Your {{name}} has reached a milestone! Choose a permanent specialization for this prestige run.
modal.evolve_warning: This choice cannot be changed until you prestige again.

1.title: The First Crack
1.text: With the first reset, a tremor runs through the Shard. It is not just a rock; it is a seed. You feel a presence stir within it, ancient and vast. It seems... pleased.

2.title: Echoes of Power
2.text: As your shard count reaches cosmic scales, you begin to hear whispers at the edge of perception. They speak of creation, of weavers, and of a reality carved from pure energy. The Shard is a key.

3.title: A Guardian's Duty
3.text: The Guardians you defeat are not evil. They are tests, projections created by the Shard to gauge your worth. Each victory proves your resolve, and the Shard resonates with your growing power.

4.title: The Weaver's Loom
4.text: The final generator is not a machine. It's a concept, a tool to manipulate the very fabric of existence. You have transcended simple creation. You are now a sculptor of reality itself.
